name: Monster Berry Ranch
description:
In a world where wild monsters run rampant, you take the role of a berry farmer.

The berries that you grow on your ranch  have the power to tame even the most wild monsters out there. You've been asked to tame and keep one of each of the local species on your ranch. Doing so will allow valuable research to be done, helping to learn more about these creatures in hopes of controlling their population or better yet, living in harmony with them!

Controls:

  • D-Pad [keys: W,A,S,D]: Move\Navigate Menus
  • A Button [key: J]: Confirm\Action
  • B Button [key: k]: Cancel\Swap Item
  • Start [key: ESC]: Pause\Exit Game
  • Select [Key: Shift]: Change Battle Character

(*This game was made for GBJam 10*)
